# Run

ftlautosave requires Java (JRE 8) to be installed.
Put ftlautosave.jar into FTL's game folder and run it. ftlautosave.cmd is optional and can be used for watching log output directly. Logs are also written to ftlautosave.log


# Configuration

FTL's save folder and game run path can be configured directly in the UI.
More advanced settings can be found in ftlautosave.json which is created on first startup.

# Other

See https://github.com/synogen/ftlautosave for a more detailed description.
